msg.msgText: XA transactions coordinated by an external transaction manager can be monitored by using the "imaserver stat Transaction" command. SYNTAX: imaserver stat Transaction help imaserver stat Transaction "XID=value" "ResultCount=value" "StatType=value" "TranState=value" "FilePrefix=value" EXAMPLE: imaserver stat Transaction "StatType=LastStateChangeTime" The valid options are: XID The XA transaction branch identifier. Asterisk matches 0 or more characters. The default value is *. ResultCount Number of returned results. The valid options are 10,25,50,100. The default value is 25. StatType The sort order in which results are returned. Specify the following StatType: LastStateChangeTime The default StatType is "LastStateChangeTime" TranState The state of transactions that are to be included in the results. The valid options are: Prepared HeuristicCommit HeuristicRollback Heuristic All The default value is "All". FilePrefix The prefix of the .CSV file that the result is saved to. The file name contains the prefix, process ID, and timestamp. If FilePrefix is not specified, then the result is displayed on the console. NOTES: 1. Specify each option as a "key=value" pair. 2. Enclose each key=value pair within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
